tetra.module.sword/basic_hilt.name: Simple hilt
tetra.module.sword/basic_hilt.descriptio: A simple sword hilt. The sword hilt is the primary source of integrity for swords.
tetra.module.sword/decorative_pommel.des: A decorative pommel, it provides a small amount of durability but has no functional value.
tetra.module.sword/makeshift_guard.name: Makeshift guard
tetra.module.sword/makeshift_guard.descr: A sword guard, its weak construction provides little protection for the wielding hand.
tetra/schema/sword/binding.name: Binding
tetra/schema/sword/binding.description: Tighten the binding between the hilt and the blade by wrapping it with rope or straps, or by using completely different materials and methods.
tetra.module.sword/binding.name: Binding
tetra.variant.sword_rope_binding.descrip: Tightly bound ropes strengthen the blade's attachment to the hilt.
tetra/schema/sword/wide_guard.name: Wide guard
tetra/schema/sword/wide_guard.descriptio: Craft a wide guard which protects the wielding hand, providing additional armor when held in the main-hand or off-hand.
tetra.module.sword/wide_guard.name: Wide guard
tetra.module.sword/wide_guard.descriptio: a wide guard which protects the wielding hand. Provides additional armor when the sword is held in the main-hand or off-hand.
tetra/schema/sword/counterweight.name: Counterweight
tetra/schema/sword/counterweight.descrip: Balance the blade with a counterweight. Greatly increases attack speed if the counterweight consumes the same amount of integrity as all other modules combined. If integrity usage differs the bonus is reduced, a large difference reduces the bonus further and may even reduce the attack speed.
tetra.module.sword/counterweight.name: Counterweight
tetra.module.sword/counterweight.descrip: A counterweight attached to the bottom of the hilt. Greatly increases attack speed if the counterweight consumes the same amount of integrity as all other modules combined. If integrity usage differs the bonus is reduced, a large difference reduces the bonus further and may even reduce the attack speed.
tetra/schema/sword/reinforced_fuller.des: Reinforce the fuller using the given material. Provides additional integrity and reduces the chance for the item to take damage, but makes the sword heavier and slower to swing.
tetra.module.sword/reinforced_fuller.des: A fuller reinforcement that provides additional integrity and reduces the chance for the item to take damage, but makes the sword heavier and slower to swing.
tetra/schema/sword/forefinger_ring.name: Forefinger ring
tetra/schema/sword/forefinger_ring.descr: Attach a ring at the top of the hilt, greatly increasing grip. Increases the minimum damage dealt when swinging too fast.
tetra.module.sword/forefinger_ring.name: Forefinger ring
tetra.module.sword/forefinger_ring.descr: A ring has been attached at the top of the hilt. The ring allows for a better grip, increasing the minimum damage dealt when swinging too fast.
tetra/schema/sword/grip_loop.name: Grip loop
tetra/schema/sword/grip_loop.description: Attach a loop at the end of the hilt, which increases the reach of the sword. Also increases the range of sweeping attacks by 2 blocks.
tetra.module.sword/grip_loop.name: Grip loop
tetra.module.sword/grip_loop.description: A loop attached at the end of the hilt that increases the reach of the sword. Also increases the range of sweeping attacks by 2 blocks.
tetra/schema/sword/basic_blade.name: Simple blade
tetra/schema/sword/basic_blade.descripti: Replace the current sword blade with the given blade, or reforge it using raw materials.
tetra.module.sword/basic_blade.name: Simple blade
tetra.module.sword/basic_blade.descripti: A basic blade with average damage, attack speed and integrity usage.
tetra/schema/sword/short_blade.name: Shortblade
tetra/schema/sword/short_blade.descripti: Replace the current sword blade with a blade that's shorter and lighter than the common blade. Allows the wielder to swing at a faster rate, but deals slightly less damage per swing compared to a regular blade. The short blade is not capable of sweeping attacks.
tetra.module.sword/short_blade.name: Shortblade
tetra.module.sword/short_blade.descripti: A blade that's shorter and lighter than the common blade, allows for a faster swing rate but deals slightly less damage per swing.
tetra/schema/sword/heavy_blade.name: Heavy blade
tetra/schema/sword/heavy_blade.descripti: Replace the current sword blade with a large and hefty blade. Sacrifices attack speed for increased damage. Has a powerful sweeping attack on fully charged attacks.
tetra.module.sword/heavy_blade.name: Heavy blade
tetra.module.sword/heavy_blade.descripti: A large and hefty blade that sacrifices attack speed for increased damage. Has a powerful sweeping attack on fully charged attacks.
tetra/schema/sword/machete.name: Machete
tetra/schema/sword/machete.description: Replace the current sword blade with a machete forged from the provided material, which can be used to cut down plants in an area. The machete works different from other tools as it instantly harvests blocks but only if it's not on swing cooldown.
tetra.module.sword/machete.name: Machete
tetra.module.sword/machete.description:
A machete which can be used to cut down plants in an area, it deals average damage and has an average attack speed.

The machete works different from other tools as it instantly harvests blocks but only if it's not on swing cooldown.
tetra/schema/double/basic_handle/basic_h: Replace the handle for the head. A sturdier handle supports heavier and more advanced tool heads.
tetra.module.double/basic_handle.name: Basic handle
tetra.module.double/basic_handle.descrip: A basic tool handle. Handles are the primary source of integrity for tools.
tetra.module.double/basic_axe.name: Axe head
tetra.module.double/basic_axe.descriptio:
A basic axe head that can primarily be used to chop things like planks and logs, but it's also useful for stripping bark from logs and crafting item modules from wood.

Double axe heads provide synergy bonuses.
tetra.improvement.basic_axe/severing.des: Deals bonus damage to unarmored targets
tetra/schema/double/basic_pickaxe/basic_:
Forge a pickaxe head from the given material.

Using double pickaxe heads makes the pickaxe able to break tougher blocks.
tetra.module.double/basic_pickaxe.name: Pickaxe head
tetra.module.double/basic_pickaxe.descri:
A basic pickaxe head that can be used for mining.

Using double pickaxe heads makes the pickaxe able to break tougher blocks.
tetra/schema/double/butt/butt.name: Tool butt
tetra/schema/double/butt/butt.descriptio: Used as the back side of a single sided tool, typically yields faster swing speed than a double sided tool. Can sometimes be used for hammering if crafted from a sturdy material.
tetra.module.double/butt.name: Tool butt
tetra.module.double/butt.description: The back side of a single sided tool, typically yields faster swing speed than a double sided head.
tetra/schema/double/adze/adze.name: Adze head
tetra/schema/double/adze/adze.descriptio: Craft an adze head from the given material. The adze can primarily be used for digging but can also be used for chopping wood.
tetra.module.double/adze.name: Adze head
tetra.module.double/adze.description: A hefty arched blade at right angles to the handle. The adze can primarily be used for digging but can also be used for chopping wood.
tetra/schema/double/claw/claw.name: Claw
tetra/schema/double/claw/claw.descriptio: Craft a claw from the given material. The claw can be used for prying things open and to quickly break most wooden blocks.
tetra.module.double/claw.name: Claw
tetra.module.double/claw.description: A slightly curved claw that can be used for prying things open, and can quickly break most wooden blocks.
tetra/schema/double/hoe/hoe.name: Hoe
tetra/schema/double/hoe/hoe.description: Craft a hoe from the given material, the hoe can be used for tilling soil.
tetra.module.double/hoe.name: Hoe
tetra.module.double/hoe.description: A basic hoe, useful for tilling soil.
tetra/schema/double/sickle/sickle.name: Sickle
tetra/schema/double/sickle/sickle.descri: Craft a sickle from the given material, which can be used to cut blocks in an area. The sickle works different from other tools as it instantly harvests blocks but only if it's not on swing cooldown.
tetra.module.double/sickle.name: Sickle
tetra.module.double/sickle.description:
A slightly arched sickle which can be used to cut blocks in an area.

Works different from other tools as it instantly harvests blocks but only if it's not on swing cooldown.
Replace the handle a basic handle crafted from the given materials. A sturdier handle supports heavier and more advanced tool heads.
tetra.module.single/basic_handle.name: Basic handle
tetra.module.single/basic_handle.descrip: A basic handle. Handles are the primary source of integrity.
Replace the handle with a lighter handle that allows the item to be thrown, but it provides less durability than other handles.
tetra.module.single/light_handle.name: Light handle
tetra.module.single/light_handle.descrip: A lighter handle that provides less durability but allows the item to be thrown. Handles are the primary source of integrity.
tetra/schema/single/handle/long_handle.d: Replace the handle with a longer handle that yields longer reach.
tetra.module.single/long_handle.name: Long handle
tetra.module.single/long_handle.descript: A longer handle that yields longer reach. Handles are the primary source of integrity.
tetra/schema/single/basic_shovel/basic_s: Forge an axe head from the given material. The shovel can primarily be used to dig into the earth, but it's also useful for make dirt paths.
tetra.module.single/basic_shovel.name: Shovel head
tetra.module.single/basic_shovel.descrip: A basic shovel head that can primarily be used to dig into the earth, but it's also useful for make dirt paths.
tetra/schema/shield/plate/tower.name: Tower plate
tetra/schema/shield/plate/tower.descript: Craft a tower shield plate from the given materials. Tower shields can block indefinitely and has no cooldown, but it uses more integrity than other types of shields.
tetra.module.shield/tower.name: Tower shield
tetra.module.shield/tower.description: A large tower shield that can block indefinitely and has no cooldown.
tetra/schema/shield/plate/heater.name: Heater plate
tetra/schema/shield/plate/heater.descrip: Craft a heater shield plate from the given materials. Heaters are medium size shields that uses less integrity than a tower shield, but can only block for a limited amount of time before going on cooldown.
tetra.module.shield/heater.name: Heater plate
tetra.module.shield/heater.description: The heater shield is a medium size shield that can only block for a limited amount of time before going on cooldown.
tetra/schema/shield/plate/buckler.name: Buckler plate
tetra/schema/shield/plate/buckler.descri: Craft a buckler from the given materials. Bucklers cannot be used to block but they provide a passive toughness bonus.
tetra.module.shield/buckler.name: Buckler plate
tetra.module.shield/buckler.description: Bucklers are small shields that provide a passive toughness bonus.
tetra/schema/shield/grip/basic_grip.name: Basic grip
tetra/schema/shield/grip/basic_grip.desc: Craft a basic grip from the given materials. Grips are the primary source of integrity for shields.
tetra.module.shield/basic_grip.name: Basic grip
tetra.module.shield/basic_grip.descripti: A basic grip. Grips are the primary source of integrity for shields.
tetra/schema/shield/grip/straps.name: Straps
tetra/schema/shield/grip/straps.descript: Replace the grip with straps crafted from the given materials. A shield held with straps is typically less taxing to use. Grips are the primary source of integrity for shields.
tetra.module.shield/straps.name: Straps
tetra.module.shield/straps.description: Straps used holding the shield. A shield held with straps is typically less taxing to use. Grips are the primary source of integrity for shields.
tetra/schema/shield/plate/trim.name: Trim edge
tetra/schema/shield/plate/trim.descripti: Frame the shield with a trim to increase it's durability, the durability bonus is multiplicative.
tetra/schema/double/binding.name: Binding
tetra/schema/double/binding.description: Bind the tool head to the handle by binding it with rope or straps, or by using completely different materials and methods.
tetra.module.double/binding.name: Binding
tetra.variant.double_rope_binding.descri: Tightly bound ropes strengthen the tool head's attachment to the handle.
tetra/schema/single/binding.name: Binding
tetra/schema/single/binding.description: Bind the tool head to the handle by binding it with rope or straps, or by using completely different materials and methods.
tetra.module.single/binding.name: Binding
tetra.variant.single_rope_binding.descri: Tightly bound ropes strengthen the tool head's attachment to the handle.
